description:
Provides an Neptune Cluster Resource. A Cluster Resource defines attributes that are
applied to the entire cluster of Neptune Cluster Instances.

Changes to a Neptune Cluster can occur when you manually change a
parameter, such as `backup_retention_period`, and are reflected in the next maintenance
window. Because of this, Terraform may report a difference in its planning
phase because a modification has not yet taken place. You can use the
`apply_immediately` flag to instruct the service to apply the change immediately
(see documentation below).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ApplyImmediately.description: Specifies whether any cluster modifications are applied immediately, or during the next maintenance window. Default is `false`.

AvailabilityZones.description: A list of EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the Neptune cluster can be created in.

BackupRetentionPeriod.description: The days to retain backups for. Default `1`.

ClusterIdentifier.description: The cluster identifier. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique identifier.

ClusterIdentifierPrefix.description: Creates a unique cluster identifier beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `cluster_identifier`.

EnableCloudwatchLogsExports.description: A list of the log types this DB cluster is configured to export to Cloudwatch Logs. Currently only supports `audit`.

Engine.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this Neptune cluster. Defaults to `neptune`.

FinalSnapshotIdentifier.description: The name of your final Neptune snapshot when this Neptune cluster is deleted. If omitted, no final snapshot will be made.

IamDatabaseAuthenticationEnabled.description: Specifies whether or mappings of AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled.

IamRoles.description: A List of ARNs for the IAM roles to associate to the Neptune Cluster.

KmsKeyArn.description: The ARN for the KMS encryption key. When specifying `kms_key_arn`, `storage_encrypted` needs to be set to true.

NeptuneClusterParameterGroupName.description: A cluster parameter group to associate with the cluster.

NeptuneSubnetGroupName.description: A Neptune subnet group to associate with this Neptune instance.

Port.description: The port on which the Neptune accepts connections. Default is `8182`.

PreferredBackupWindow.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled using the BackupRetentionPeriod parameter. Time in UTC. Default: A 30-minute window selected at random from an 8-hour block of time per region. e.g. 04:00-09:00.

PreferredMaintenanceWindow.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in (UTC) e.g. wed:04:00-wed:04:30.

ReplicationSourceIdentifier.description: ARN of a source Neptune cluster or Neptune instance if this Neptune cluster is to be created as a Read Replica.

SkipFinalSnapshot.description: Determines whether a final Neptune snapshot is created before the Neptune cluster is deleted. If true is specified, no Neptune snapshot is created. If false is specified, a Neptune snapshot is created before the Neptune cluster is deleted, using the value from `final_snapshot_identifier`. Default is `false`.

SnapshotIdentifier.description: Specifies whether or not to create this cluster from a snapshot. You can use either the name or ARN when specifying a Neptune cluster snapshot, or the ARN when specifying a Neptune snapshot.

StorageEncrypted.description: Specifies whether the Neptune cluster is encrypted. The default is `false` if not specified.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Neptune cluster.

VpcSecurityGroupIds.description: List of VPC security groups to associate with the Cluster.
